conversionTableKeys.title: Keys to match in conversion table

value.title: Value
value.description: Value to use for the operation

actions.name: AttributeMapper

mappers.title: Attribute Mappers
mappers.description: List of mapping rules to transform attributes using expressions or value copying

valueAttribute.title: Attribute name to get value from

actions.name: BoundsExtractor
actions.description: 境界を抽出する

xmin.title: Minimum X Attribute

ymax.title: Maximum Y Attribute

ymin.title: Minimum Y Attribute
ymin.description: Attribute name for storing the minimum Y coordinate (defaults to "ymin")

zmin.title: Minimum Z Attribute

parameter.title: Bufferer Parameters
parameter.description: Configure how to create buffers around input geometries

bufferType.title: Buffer Type
bufferType.description: The type of buffer to create around the input geometry

distance.title: Distance
distance.description: The distance to extend the buffer from the original geometry (in coordinate units)

interpolationAngle.title: Interpolation Angle
interpolationAngle.description: The angle in degrees used for curve interpolation when creating rounded corners

oneOf.title: 2D Area Buffer
oneOf.description: Creates a 2D polygon buffer around the input geometry

actions.name: BulkAttributeRenamer

parameter.title: BulkAttributeRenamer Parameters
parameter.description: Configure how to rename feature attributes in bulk operations

renameAction.title: Rename Operation
renameAction.description: The type of renaming operation to perform on the attribute names

renameType.title: Which Attributes to Rename
renameType.description: Choose whether to rename all attributes or only selected ones

renameValue.title: Text Value
renameValue.description: The text to add as prefix/suffix, remove, or use as replacement

selectedAttributes.title: Selected Attribute Names
selectedAttributes.description: List of specific attribute names to rename (required when "Selected Attributes" is chosen)

textToFind.title: Text Pattern to Find
textToFind.description: Regular expression pattern to match when using "Replace Text" operation

oneOf.title: Add Prefix
oneOf.description: Add text to the beginning of attribute names

oneOf.title: Add Suffix
oneOf.description: Add text to the end of attribute names

oneOf.title: Remove Prefix
oneOf.description: Remove text from the beginning of attribute names

oneOf.title: Remove Suffix
oneOf.description: Remove text from the end of attribute names

oneOf.title: Replace Text
oneOf.description: Find and replace text using regular expressions

oneOf.title: All Attributes
oneOf.description: Rename all attributes in the feature

oneOf.title: Selected Attributes
oneOf.description: Rename only specific attributes listed below

actions.description: Creates instance histogram for PLATEAU4 building features

actions.name: PLATEAU4.MaxLodExtractor
actions.description: PLATEAU4の最大詳細レベルを抽出する

parameter.title: MaxLodExtractor Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for extracting maximum LOD (Level of Detail) information from PLATEAU4 CityGML files.

actions.name: PLATEAU4.MissingAttributeDetector
actions.description: PLATEAU4データの欠落属性を検出する

parameter.title: MissingAttributeDetector Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for detecting missing attributes in PLATEAU4 features.

actions.name: PLATEAU4.ObjectListExtractor
actions.description: PLATEAU4データからオブジェクトリストを抽出する

parameter.title: ObjectListExtractor Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for extracting object lists from PLATEAU4 data.

actions.name: PLATEAU4.UDXFolderExtractor
actions.description: PLATEAU4データからUDXフォルダを抽出する

parameter.title: UDXFolderExtractor Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for extracting UDX folder structure information from PLATEAU4 CityGML paths.

actions.name: PLATEAU4.UnmatchedXlinkDetector
actions.description: Detect unmatched Xlinks for PLATEAU

actions.name: PlanarityFilter
actions.description: タイプに基づいてジオメトリをフィルタリングする

actions.name: PythonScriptProcessor
actions.description: Execute Python Scripts with Geospatial Data Processing

actions.name: Refiner
actions.description: ジオメトリを精緻化する

actions.name: RhaiCaller
actions.description: Rhaiスクリプトを呼び出す

parameter.title: RhaiCaller Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for executing Rhai scripts on features with conditional processing.

isTarget.description: Rhai script expression to determine if the feature should be processed (returns boolean)

process.description: Rhai script expression to process and transform the feature when target condition is met

actions.name: ShapefileReader
actions.description: Reads geographic features from Shapefile archives (.zip containing .shp, .dbf, .shx files)

parameter.title: ShapefileReader Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for reading Shapefile archives as geographic features. Expects a ZIP archive containing the required Shapefile components (.shp, .dbf, .shx).

dataset.title: File Path
dataset.description: Expression that returns the path to the input file (e.g., "data.csv" or variable reference)

encoding.title: Character Encoding
encoding.description: Character encoding for attribute data in the DBF file (e.g., "UTF-8", "Shift_JIS")

force2d.title: Force 2D
force2d.description: If true, forces all geometries to be 2D (ignoring Z values)

inline.title: Inline Content
inline.description: Expression that returns the file content as text instead of reading from a file path

actions.name: ShapefileWriter
actions.description: シェープファイルに地物を書き込む

parameter.title: ShapefileWriter Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for writing features to ESRI Shapefile format.

groupBy.description: Optional attributes to group features by, creating separate files for each group

output.description: Output path or expression for the Shapefile to create

actions.name: SqlReader
actions.description: SQLデータベースから地物を読み取る

parameter.title: SQL Reader Parameters
parameter.description: Configure the SQL query and database connection for reading features from a database

sql.title: SQL Query
sql.description: SQL query expression to execute for retrieving data

actions.name: StatisticsCalculator
actions.description: 地物の統計情報を計算する

parameter.title: StatisticsCalculator Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for calculating statistical aggregations on feature attributes.

aggregateAttribute.description: Attribute to group features by for aggregation

aggregateName.description: Name of the attribute containing the aggregate group name

calculations.description: List of statistical calculations to perform on grouped features

actions.name: SurfaceFootprintReplacer
actions.description: サーフェスジオメトリをフットプリントで置き換える

parameter.title: SurfaceFootprintReplacer Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for replacing geometry with its footprint projection.

actions.name: ThreeDimensionBoxReplacer
actions.description: 3次元ボックスをポリゴンで置き換える

parameter.title: 3D Box Replacer Parameters
parameter.description: Configure which attributes contain the minimum and maximum coordinates for creating a 3D box

maxX.title: Maximum X Attribute
maxX.description: Name of attribute containing the maximum X coordinate

maxY.title: Maximum Y Attribute
maxY.description: Name of attribute containing the maximum Y coordinate

maxZ.title: Maximum Z Attribute
maxZ.description: Name of attribute containing the maximum Z coordinate

minX.title: Minimum X Attribute
minX.description: Name of attribute containing the minimum X coordinate

minY.title: Minimum Y Attribute
minY.description: Name of attribute containing the minimum Y coordinate

minZ.title: Minimum Z Attribute
minZ.description: Name of attribute containing the minimum Z coordinate

actions.name: ThreeDimensionPlanarityRotator
actions.description: 3Dで平面を回転させる

actions.name: ThreeDimensionRotator
actions.description: 3次元ボックスをポリゴンで置き換える

parameter.title: 3D Rotator Parameters
parameter.description: Configure the 3D rotation parameters including axis, origin point, and angle

angleDegree.title: Angle in Degrees
angleDegree.description: Rotation angle in degrees around the specified axis

directionX.title: Direction X
directionX.description: X component of the rotation axis direction vector

directionY.title: Direction Y
directionY.description: Y component of the rotation axis direction vector

directionZ.title: Direction Z
directionZ.description: Z component of the rotation axis direction vector

originX.title: Origin X
originX.description: X coordinate of the rotation origin point

originY.title: Origin Y
originY.description: Y coordinate of the rotation origin point

originZ.title: Origin Z
originZ.description: Z coordinate of the rotation origin point

actions.name: TwoDimensionForcer
actions.description: ジオメトリを2次元に強制する

actions.name: VertexRemover
actions.description: 地物のジオメトリから特定の頂点を削除する

actions.name: VerticalReprojector
actions.description: 地物のジオメトリを指定された座標系に垂直再投影する

parameter.title: Vertical Reprojector Parameters
parameter.description: Configure the type of vertical datum conversion to apply

reprojectorType.title: Reprojector Type
reprojectorType.description: The type of vertical coordinate transformation to apply

actions.name: WasmRuntimeExecutor
actions.description: スクリプトを.wasmにコンパイルし、wasmランタイムで実行する

parameter.title: WasmRuntimeExecutor Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for compiling and executing scripts in WebAssembly runtime.

processorType.title: Processor Type
processorType.description: Type of processor to create (Source, Processor, or Sink)

programmingLanguage.title: Programming Language
programmingLanguage.description: Programming language of the source script (currently supports Python)

source.title: Source Code
source.description: Script source code or path to compile to WebAssembly

actions.name: XMLFragmenter
actions.description: XMLを分割する

parameter.title: XMLFragmenter Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for fragmenting XML documents into smaller pieces.

oneOf.description: URL-based source configuration for XML fragmenting

actions.name: XMLValidator
actions.description: XMLコンテンツを検証する

actions.name: ZipFileWriter
actions.description: zipファイルに地物を書き込む

parameter.title: ZipFileWriter Parameters
parameter.description: Configuration for creating ZIP archive files from features.
